entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Guess what? I'm a "senior citizen" as well as many of my friends. We aren't feeble-minded idiots willing to lay down our lives for the stock market that you want us to be. We won't forget. Not now and certainly not in November. #VoteBlueToSaveAmerica2020 https://t.co/TacAgVsvei
